Judul: Signs of buried lake on Mars tantalize scientists If confirmed, the lake would be the first body of liquid water ever detected on the red planet.
Abstrak:
A large saltwater lake seems to lurk under ice near Mars’s south pole. If confirmed, it would be the first body
of liquid water ever detected on the red planet, and a significant milestone in the quest to determine whether life exists there
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
